languages.text: {n}Блеф игнорирует арбитра, его взгляд прикован к вам — точнее, к {d|Encyclopedia:FW_TookAmuletDecision}колье на вашей груди{/d}.{/n} "Милая вещица, не правда ли?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Блеф игнорирует арбитра, его взгляд прикован к вам — точнее, к {d|Encyclopedia:FW_TookAmuletDecision}колье на вашей груди{/d}.{/n} "Милая вещица, не правда ли?"

languages.text: {n}Bluff ignores the Arbitrator, his gaze fixed on you — more specifically, on the {d|Encyclopedia:FW_TookAmuletDecision}necklace on your chest{/d}.{/n} "A lovely piece, isn't it?"

languages.text: {n}闹闹没有理会索罗蒙的咆哮。他的目光紧紧盯着你，或者更确切地说，是盯着{d|Encyclopedia:FW_TookAmuletDecision}你胸前的项链{/d}。{/n}“真是条可爱的项链，你说呢？”
languages.original_text: {n}Bluff ignores the Arbitrator, his gaze fixed on you — more specifically, on the {d|Encyclopedia:FW_TookAmuletDecision}necklace on your chest{/d}.{/n} "A lovely piece, isn't it?"

traits.locale_text: {n}闹闹没有理会索罗蒙的咆哮。他的目光紧紧盯着你，或者更确切地说，是盯着你胸前的项链。{/n}“真是条可爱的项链，你说呢？”
{n}闹闹没有理会索罗蒙的咆哮。他的目光紧紧盯着你，或者更确切地说，是盯着你胸前的项链。{/n}“真是条可爱的项链，你说呢？”

languages.text: {n}Farol ignora al Arbitrator; tiene la mirada fija en ti, concretamente en el {d|Encyclopedia:FW_TookAmuletDecision}collar que cuelga sobre tu pecho{/d}.{/n} «Una baratija la mar de mona, ¿no cree?».
languages.original_text: {n}Bluff ignores the Arbitrator, his gaze fixed on you — more specifically, on the {d|Encyclopedia:FW_TookAmuletDecision}necklace on your chest{/d}.{/n} "A lovely piece, isn't it?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Farol ignora al Arbitrator; tiene la mirada fija en ti, concretamente en el collar que cuelga sobre tu pecho.{/n} «Una baratija la mar de mona, ¿no cree?».
{n}Farol ignora al Arbitrator; tiene la mirada fija en ti, concretamente en el collar que cuelga sobre tu pecho.{/n} «Una baratija la mar de mona, ¿no cree?».

languages.text: {n}Bakışlarını senden, daha doğrusu {d|Encyclopedia:FW_TookAmuletDecision}göğsündeki kolyeden{/d} ayırmaya Kurusıkı; Yargıcı'yı görmezden geliyor.{/n} "Hoş bir parça, değil mi?"
languages.original_text: {n}Bluff ignores the Arbitrator, his gaze fixed on you — more specifically, on the {d|Encyclopedia:FW_TookAmuletDecision}necklace on your chest{/d}.{/n} "A lovely piece, isn't it?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Bakışlarını senden, daha doğrusu göğsündeki kolyeden ayırmaya Kurusıkı; Yargıcı'yı görmezden geliyor.{/n} "Hoş bir parça, değil mi?"
{n}Bakışlarını senden, daha doğrusu göğsündeki kolyeden ayırmaya Kurusıkı; Yargıcı'yı görmezden geliyor.{/n} "Hoş bir parça, değil mi?"

languages.text: {n}ブラフはアービトレイターを無視し、彼の視線はあなたに―具体的には、{d|Encyclopedia:FW_TookAmuletDecision}あなたの胸にあるネックス{/d}の上に釘付けになる。{/n}「素晴らしい一品じゃないか？」
languages.original_text: {n}Bluff ignores the Arbitrator, his gaze fixed on you — more specifically, on the {d|Encyclopedia:FW_TookAmuletDecision}necklace on your chest{/d}.{/n} "A lovely piece, isn't it?"

traits.locale_text: {n}ブラフはアービトレイターを無視し、彼の視線はあなたに―具体的には、あなたの胸にあるネックスの上に釘付けになる。{/n}「素晴らしい一品じゃないか？」
{n}ブラフはアービトレイターを無視し、彼の視線はあなたに―具体的には、あなたの胸にあるネックスの上に釘付けになる。{/n}「素晴らしい一品じゃないか？」

languages.text: {n}Les yeux rivés sur vous, ou plus précisément sur le {d|Encyclopedia:FW_TookAmuletDecision}collier qui ceint votre cou{/d}, Bluff ignore complètement l'arbitrator.{/n} « Magnifique bijou, n'est-ce pas ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Bluff ignores the Arbitrator, his gaze fixed on you — more specifically, on the {d|Encyclopedia:FW_TookAmuletDecision}necklace on your chest{/d}.{/n} "A lovely piece, isn't it?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Les yeux rivés sur vous, ou plus précisément sur le collier qui ceint votre cou, Bluff ignore complètement l'arbitrator.{/n} « Magnifique bijou, n'est-ce pas ? »
{n}Les yeux rivés sur vous, ou plus précisément sur le collier qui ceint votre cou, Bluff ignore complètement l'arbitrator.{/n} « Magnifique bijou, n'est-ce pas ? »

languages.text: {n}Bluff ignoriert den Arbitrator, sein Blick ist starr auf dich gerichtet, genauer gesagt auf die {d|Encyclopedia:FW_TookAmuletDecision}Halskette auf deiner Brust{/d}.{/n} "Ein wunderschönes Stück, nicht wahr?"
languages.original_text: {n}Bluff ignores the Arbitrator, his gaze fixed on you — more specifically, on the {d|Encyclopedia:FW_TookAmuletDecision}necklace on your chest{/d}.{/n} "A lovely piece, isn't it?"
